attributes.action: use overhead motorway signs to advise motorists on the use of fog lights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by using motorway traffic cameras to measure visibility, the new overhead signs should also be used to advise drivers whether or not to use their foglights. Foglights can be very dangerous when used in the rain as the drivers behind cannot tell when this car is breaking.a simple 'no foglights required' message would be appropriate.
